Method Detail

filterLineNumber

public boolean filterLineNumber(Document doc)
Filter out line numbering possibly present in the document. This can be frequent for document in a review/submission format and degrades strongly the machine learning extraction results.

Parameters:
doc - a document
Returns:
if found numbering

firstPass

public static void firstPass(Document doc)
First pass to detect basic structures: remove page header/footer, identify section numbering, identify Figure and table blocks.

Parameters:
doc - a document

a document
